title: kalaya yasOdE
sahitya:
Kalaya Yashodhe thava Baalam

Kalabaalaka Kelana Lolam



caraNam 1



Abahrutha Bahuthara navaneetham

Anupama leela Natanakritham

Kapata Maanushaa Baalakacharitham

Kalitha Kandhuka Kelanitharam



caraNam 2



Pathi Pathi Lunditha Dhathi Paandam

Paapa Dhimira Shata maarthaandam

Adhika bhaloth dhritha jagadhandam

Aananda Bodha Rasa makandam



caraNam 3



Malla Baalaka Kelana chaturam

Manasija Koti Laavanya Bharam

Kalyana Guna Navamani Nikaram

Kamaneeya Kausthuba Mani shekaram



caraNam 4



Navaneetha Chora baalaka charitham

Nandhadhi Vrajapunya tharu palitham

Dhruva palamedhadhilalitham puvi

Naaraayana Theertha yathi panitham
